description.ko: FLORA-9은 유기적인 식물 생명체와 합성 지능 사이의 경계를 탐구합니다. 이 작품은 자연이 세포 구조 내에 데이터를 저장하도록 적응하여 빛나고 상호 연결된 디지털 숲을 형성하는 근미래의 생태계를 시각화합니다.
description.en: FLORA-9 explores the boundary between organic botanical life and synthetic intelligence. This piece visualizes a near-future ecosystem where nature has adapted to store data within its cellular structure, creating a glowing, interconnected digital forest.

prompt: A macro cinematic shot of a futuristic FLORA-9 flower, translucent crystalline petals pulsing with soft cyan fiber-optic light, intricate gold circuit board patterns etched onto dark emerald leaves, floating holographic pollen particles, deep bokeh forest background with digital rain, hyper-realistic textures, 8k resolution, ray tracing.
